title.rendered: ULTRALOQ UL3 BT BLUETOOTH ENABLED FINGERPRINT AND TOUCHSCREEN SMART LEVER LOCK

content.rendered:
Ultraloq UL3 BT smart lever lock is designed to be “Real Keyless”. You are free to use fingerprint, code, key or smartphone to unlock. You can just knock on your phone to open the door, even when it’s in your pocket.

Features

  • Sensor : Optical fingerprint sensor
  • Sensor Wake Up Mode : Touch Auto wakeup
  • Resolution : 500 DPI
  • Fingerprint Capacity : 95
  • Code Capacity : 95
  • Identification Mode : Fingerprint, Bluetooth 4.0, code
  • Identification Time : <0.5 Sec>
  • Case Material : Strong Zinc Alloy
  • Reversible Handle : Yes
  • Door Thickness : 35 – 44 mm
  • Working Voltage : 4.5V (3 x AA batteries included)
